scripts.build: rm dist/index.html && ln src/index.html dist/index.html && node scripts/createSizeStyles.js && sass src/style.scss dist/style.css && webpack --config webpack.development.js
scripts.deploy: rm -r dist && mkdir dist && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && node scripts/createSizeStyles.js && sass src/style.scss dist/style.css --no-source-map && webpack --config webpack.production.js
